title: Why can't I hear any voice when I have video or audio chats using the Bluetooth headset?
answer:
Some earlier versions of chat applications can only transmit the voice to the receiver or speaker when you have video or audio chats using a Bluetooth headset. Try updating the chat application to the latest version.

If you connect the Bluetooth headset to your phone during video or audio chat, the voice may be transmitted to your phone's microphone instead of the Bluetooth headset microphone.
